name: Soldier of Fortune 2: Double Helix
description:
Soldier of Fortune 2: Double Helix is a shooter game developed by Raven Software. It came out on 20-05-2002. It was published by 1C Company. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Soldier of Fortune 2: Double Helix is available on Xbox and PC.
It was produced by Ben Smedstad and Sam Nouriani. It was directed by Brian Pelletier, Brian Raffel, Dan Vondrak and Jon Zuk. Chip Burwell, John Scott and Zachary Quarles scored the game.
